div.p: Historical extreme values of CH for the period 1990â€“2009. The number of days per year on average that CH exceeds a threshold value is presented. This is shown based on CH >6 for different data sets: ( a) ERA-Interim reanalysis; ( b) GCMs; ( c) CCAM; and ( d) WRF. This is also shown for CH >10 for different data sets: ( e) ERA-Interim reanalysis; ( f) GCMs; ( g) CCAM; and ( h) WRF.
